short_summary: Standing Offer for General Maintenance Services for Real Property Safety and Security (RPSS) Gulf Region Prince Edward Island (PEI) Sites.
description: This requirement is for general maintenance services to DFO custodial buildings located in the province of Prince Edward Island, on a "as and when requested"  basis, pertaining to the Civil, Structural, Plumbing, HVAC and Electrical disciplines.
full_summary:
**Standing Offer for General Maintenance Services for Real Property Safety and Security (RPSS) Gulf Region Prince Edward Island (PEI) Sites**

**Publication Date:** 2024-02-15  
**Closing Date:** 2024-03-26T14:00:00  
**Tender Reference:** cb-434-92508071

**Background:**  
Pêches et Océans Canada (DFO) is seeking a Standing Offer to provide general maintenance services for its custodial buildings located in the province of Prince Edward Island. These services will be provided on an "as and when requested" basis, covering various disciplines including civil, structural, plumbing, HVAC, and electrical.

**Scope of Work:**  
The general maintenance and repair services include but are not limited to:

*   Structural repairs, inspection, and maintenance
*   Electrical repairs, maintenance, and inspections
*   HVAC maintenance and repair
*   Civil work including asphalt repair, ditching, drainage control, and aggregate application
*   Plumbing maintenance and repair
*   General labor to assist with physical tasks related to the above listed tasks

**Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements:**  
The Standing Offer is for the delivery of requirements to identified users across Canada, excluding locations within Yukon, Northwest Territories, Nunavut, Quebec, and Labrador that are subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements.

**Security Requirements:**  
There are no security requirements associated with this Standing Offer; however, security requirements are indicated in Part 7A – Standing Offer.

**Trade Agreements:**  
This requirement is subject to various trade agreements including the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), and others.

**Contract Period:**  
The contract period will be for five years from the date of award.

Any interested contractors should submit their proposals in accordance with the instructions outlined in the Request for Standing Offer.

**How to Respond:**  
To submit a proposal, follow the instructions provided in the notice and attach the required documents.

**Contact Information:**

*   Juan Villasana
*   DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca
*   (343) 597-5129
*   [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/31923/rfso-30001379.pdf](https://canadabu
